text: Ronald Charles "Ron" Marlenee (August 8, 1935 â€“ April 26, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was in the United States House of Representatives from Montana between January 3, 1977 to January 3, 1993. He represented . Marlenee was born in Scobey, Montana. Marlenee died on April 26, 2020 in Bozeman, Montana of a short-illness, aged 84.Longtime Montana congressman Ron Marlenee dies ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:United States representatives from Montana Category:People from Bozeman, Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in Montana
